actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to establish a national research data bank.

summary.text: National Research Coordination Act - Declares that it is the purpose of this Act to establish a National Research Data Bank which will collect in one place all available information and data relating to research programs which are being conducted with Federal assistance. Authorizes the Comptroller General to develop, establish and maintain such a Data Bank. States that all information and data which are stored in the Data Bank shall be public information except for such information and data which the President determines to be classified for reasons of national security. Authorizes the Comptroller General to publish annually a catalog containing a summary of all information and data available to the public.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national research data bank.
